name: Mobile view: Post options menu (3-dots) is present on a reply post in RHS

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)
customFields.Update notes:
Steve Mudie — Tuesday, September 22, 2020 2:53 PM
• Removed from manual testing

inline.description:
Mobile view: Post options menu (3-dots) is present on a reply post in RHS
--------------------
1. On Webapp mobile view, click on reply to an existing post.
2. Type a message and click on Add comment.
inline.expectedResult: After 2) you can still see the 3-dot post options menu visible to the right of your post and clicking on the menu opens it and displays post options
